Daly_City.KOFY-TV: KOFY-TV, virtual channel 20 (UHF digital channel 19), is an independent television station licensed to San Francisco, California, United States and serving the San Francisco Bay Area. The station is owned by Granite Broadcasting. KOFY's studios are located on Marin Street in the Bernal Heights neighborhood of San Francisco, and its transmitter is located atop the Sutro Tower.
